extendedInfo.description: The Corvallis-Benton County Public Library, serving the City of Corvallis and all Benton County Communities.Search our catalog for books, movies, music and more. Manage your account, place holds and renew books, check due dates, and view your account balance. Ask a librarian a question via email, IM, text or telephone. Check our calendar of events for classes, author readings, and story times. Find your nearest branch location and view hours, addresses, and get directions. Connect and follow our library blogs, Facebook and Twitter. The web enabled search is designed for mobile devices â just type in the first few words and the results will display. To search for âStephen Kingâ, for example, all you need to type is âste kiâ.
